content: अभिन्न {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not broken or cut, unbroken; not split; अभिन्नपुटोत्तरान् <ls>R. 17. 12.</ls> {@--2@} Unaffected; क्लेशलेशैरभिन्नं <ls>Ś. 2. 4.</ls> {@--3@} Not changed or altered, unchanged; °गतयः <ls>Ś. 1. 14</ls> with their gait unchanged. {@--4@} Not different from, the same, identical (with <ab>abl.</ab>); जगन्मिथोभिन्नमभिन्नमीश्वरात् <ls>Prab.</ls> {@--5@} Undivided, whole, one (as number). {@--6@} Holding together, continuous.
